listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.2-0 are included:

listitem.simpara: python-cryptography (2016-9243) (44741).
The configuration file of univention-net-installer has been upgraded to use the Apache 2.4 syntax (44213).
The LDAP scheme has been expanded by additional LDAP attributes to add support for forwarding user emails to external addresses (42249).
The possibility to change the font color on the portal page has been added (44697).
The BDB cache is now migrated to MDB in case it didn't happen during update (44466).
Values inside of grids are now sorted locale aware (44361).
Allow UMC feedback dialog for non traceback errors (44527).
The link to send feedback to Univention has been fixed (44381).
The way a grid is sorted is now better configurable for module developers (44652).
Progress bars are now escaping HTML content more strict (44498).
The possibility to change the font color on the portal page has been added (44697).
The reason why changing the password failed is shown again (41786).
An error during login via SAML has been fixed (44217).
A redirection loop during SAML login is prevented (44450).
The PAM configuration has been adjusted to make password changes possible again if the password was expired (43859).
The error handling on module initialization has been improved (44428).
If the URL to access UMC contained a port a XSRF attack was wrong detected causing UMC to be unusable. This has been fixed (44564).
The link to send feedback to Univention has been fixed (44381).
A crash of the UMC server during handling of errors has been fixed (44365).
A notification about the Administrator account is shown when trying to login as root (40986).
After a failed attempt to change an expired user password via the login dialog the form fields weren't reset resulting in further authentication attempts being impossible (44720).
The App Center now uses a different directory for special temporary files for Docker Apps to avoid problems with the System V init tmp cleanup (44501).
During the remove of Docker Apps, the App is stopped via the init script (44286).
Error handling has been improved (44493).
Some Docker Apps did not register their user management extensions properly. This has been fixed (44550).
Handle errors for package manager lock during docker installation in UMC (41303)
Handle BadStatusLine line error (34543).
Admin credentials are now passed to a preinst script during App installation / upgrade (44654).
Progress bars are now escaping HTML content more strict (44498).
Start containers with the hosts proxy settings by default (44561).
A script can now be run after configuring an App (44750).
Under certain circumstances, it was possible that the CLI selected the wrong App version. This issue has been fixed (44724).
AdditionalPackages defined by the App are no longer removed when uninstalling an app (44778).
The cron job for the updater check has been deactivated in univention-docker-container-mode (44630).
A template for Docker proxy settings has been added (44536).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: The unmaintained and deprecated internal test suite has been removed (27286).
Fix handling of "Change password on next login" for new user accounts (42148).
Support for forwarding user emails to external addresses has been added (42249).
The error handling regarding LDAP size limits has been improved (42533).
Creating computers with IPv6 addresses is possible again (44152).
Fix typo in users module when reading the minimal password length (44472).
The default value of extended attributes which don't define any default has been changed from an empty string to None (41053).
A regression in UCS 4.2 has been fixed which caused that DHCP pools which have values unknown by UDM in its dhcpPermitList could not be opened or modified anymore (44611).
The font color on the portal page can be configured now (44697).
Default values (especially from extended attributes) are now pre filled when modifying objects (41053).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: The AWS Apache start site link has been corrected (42133).
The package univention-self-service-master is now also downloaded while preparing an appliance (44284).
The package univention-samba is now also downloaded while preparing an appliance (44522).
A cleanup script used in Univention App Appliances has been adapted for UCS 4.2 (44575).
IP address changes are now also applied to portal entries (43671).
When selecting fast demo mode in an App Appliance, all IP addresses in LDAP are reconfigured to the correct address (43140).
The overview of changed network settings doesn't show HTML code anymore (41204).
The decision between joining systems into UCS or Active Directory domains was confusing and has been improved (44035).
A crash is prevented when trying to join into an Active Directory domain and the Active Directory server is not reachable (44394).
A crash is prevented in appliance scenarios if no domain name was entered (43273).
The UMC module System services showed the Cyrus IMAP service always as stopped. It does now show the correct service state. This issue has been fixed (44594).
The file containing the APT repository during a UCS release update is no longer deleted on failures to allow fixing failed updates more easily (44346).
A check to deny update on UCS member servers with the package slapd has been added to the updater preup script (44650)
Make DNS lookup more robust for Kerberos kinit in admember.check_ad_account (38285).
Handle NoAnswer exception of dns.resolver when looking for _domaincontroller_master._tcp SRV record during Active Directory member setup (38788).
Properly stop Samba before running the Active Directory member setup (44144).
The re-connecting methods for add and modify of python LDAP are used to better handle SERVER_DOWN conditions (44316).
The memcache service for the self service module did not start, because it was misconfigured. This issue has been fixed (44477).
The Fetchmail password attributes now disallows substring searches and are not searchable in UMC anymore (41336).
The Fetchmail ACLs now respect overridden default group names (33648).
After an upgrade from UCS 4.1 to UCS 4.2 the Cyrus daemons did not start automatically anymore. When installing this update the service will be enabled automatically in systemd (44377).
The paths to Cyrus executables have been adjusted for Debian Jessie (44424, 44566).

The path to the tool to automatically purge old entries from the Cyrus "duplicate delivery database" has been fixed. As the path was wrong in the past, the tool never ran. When starting it (the first time), it may take minutes or hours (depending on the database size). Via the new Univention Configuration variables mail/cyrus/duplicate-supression/expiry/start and mail/cyrus/duplicate-supression/expiry/event this cleanup job can be configured to be run when starting Cyrus or regularly at 4:01 each night (22852).
The package dependencies allow now to install Dovecot Pro instead of Dovecot from the UCS repositories (44559).

Support for forwarding user emails to external addresses has been added. During the update, the Univention Configuration variables mail/postfix/virtual/alias/maps and mail/postfix/virtual/mailbox/maps are updated automatically, because some postfix virtual lookup tables have been modified. Please note, that the forwarding of emails on systems with OX App Suite will only come into effect if at least version 7.8.3-ucs2 of OX App Suite is installed (42249).
The default of the UCR variable mail/postfix/tls/client/level when unset has been changed to "may". On existing UCS installations this has already been set explicitly (44589).

When a relay host with authentication is used (mail/relayauth=yes), the Postfix option smtp_tls_security_level will automatically be set to "encrypt", unless mail/postfix/tls/client/level is set to "none" (44589).
Entries in the SMTP client TLS policy table can now be configured for each domain or mail exchanger individually through the UCR variables mail/postfix/tls/client/policy/.* (44811).
Samba is now reloaded after printer has been created (44153).
IPv6 support for allowed hosts has been added (44454).
User accounts from Active Directory are now able to change their expired password via UMC (43859).
When switching to UCS 4.2 the program name of squid's Kerberos authentication handler has changed. The authentication helper of univention-squid has been changed accordingly (44287).
Allow IPv6 addresses in UCR variable squid/allowfrom (29576).
Exceptions for the apache2/force_https configuration can now be configured via UCR. When apache2/force_https is enabled, by default "localhost" will be excluded (44628)
Allow TTLS to be disabled via UCR freeradius/conf/auth-type/ttls (42728)
Allow the ports the server listens on to be configured via UCR freeradius/conf/port and freeradius/conf/accountingport (42729).
Allow the maximum number of requests which the server keeps track of to be configured via UCR freeradius/conf/max_requests (42730).
The unused PAM access file has been removed (33702).

The UCR variable samba/idmap/range has been added to configure the uid and gid range for the default (*) idmap backend. This can be used to avoid overlaps between that default range and the domain specific setting, which is configurable via samba/idmap/$windows_domain/range (44549).

The UCR variables samba/client/min/protocol, samba/min/protocol and samba/client/max/protocol have been added. Please be aware that raising samba/min/protocol e.g. to SMB2 also requires raising samba/client/max/protocol to that value or higher (44591).
Improve handling of tombstoned DNS objects during DDNS update (39806).
Keep DNS_TYPE_TOMBSTONE value marker and dnsTombstoned attribute in sync (39806).
Allow DDNS update if the account name of authenticated machine matches the name of the target record (41190).
Don't fail join if CNF objects are in serverReferenceBL (43280)
Don't consider unreachable UCS@school Slave DCs for joining (43478)
Support uppercase CN attribute in sysvol-cleanup.py (43620)
Adjust check_essential_samba4_dns_records.sh to change of behavior of the host command in UCS 4.2 (44535)

The UCR variables samba/client/min/protocol, samba/min/protocol and samba/client/max/protocol have been added. Please be aware that raising samba/min/protocol e.g. to SMB2 also requires raising samba/client/max/protocol to that value or higher (44643).
Make sysvol-sync.sh robust against varying stderr output from rsync (44694).
Update Samba package and restart BIND9 on upgrade to make BIND9 load the updated dlz_bind9 module version, which contains improvements in the handling of DDNS updates (39806, 41190).
Avoid traceback in case AD Takeover is run in AD member mode (38983).
Fix fetching the SID in sync_from_ucs ALREADY_EXISTS handling (43368)
Fix handling special case of Printer-Admins (44276)
Fix the handling of UTF-8 encoded DNs (44276)
Don't append a trailing dot to DNS alias values if there is no dot (31311).
Allow removal of specific sub-objects objects in sync_from_ucs (33882).
Don't consider unreachable UCS@school Slave DCs when looking for hosts (43478). running a S4-Connector
Fix handling of Printer-Admins (44517).
The KDM init script now waits for the stop of the plymouth bootsplash before starting and presenting the KDE login window (44452).
A symbolic link has been added to enable debootstrap for UCS 4.2 (44593).
All postgresql-9.4 packages are now available in UCS 4.2 (44507).
Missing French translations have been updated (44133).
Removed the App re-registration during the upgrade to UCS 4.2-1. This was only necessary for upgrades to UCS 4.2-0 (44812).
